name: Invincible
description: This Wildkin takes 0 damage from the next attack that hits it.

name: Reflect Damage
description: The next time this Wildkin is attacked, it takes half damage and the attacker takes the other half.

name: Burrow
description: This Wildkin takes no damage from attacks until your next turn.

name: Mighty Blow
description: Attack is buffed by 4 and immediately attacks!

name: Precision Shot
description: Deal 5 damage to one of the opponent's benched Wildkin.

name: Healing Waters
description: Heal your entire team (active and benched) for 6 HP.
